EnvironmentContext.description: Represents an environment context for feature flag evaluation.
EnvironmentContext.title: EnvironmentContext

FeatureContext.description: Represents a feature context for feature flag evaluation.

key.description: Key used when selecting a value for a multivariate feature. Set to an internal identifier or a UUID, depending on Flagsmith implementation.
key.title: Key

enabled.description: Indicates whether the feature is enabled in the environment.
enabled.title: Enabled

value.description: A default environment value for the feature. If the feature is multivariate, this will be the control value.
value.title: Value

variants.description: An array of environment default values associated with the feature. Contains a single value for standard features, or multiple values for multivariate features.
variants.title: Variants

FeatureContext.title: FeatureContext

FeatureValue.description: Represents a multivariate value for a feature flag.

weight.description: The weight of the feature value variant, as a percentage number (i.e. 100.0).
weight.title: Weight

FeatureValue.title: FeatureValue

IdentityContext.description: Represents an identity context for feature flag evaluation.

identifier.description: A unique identifier for an identity, used for segment and multivariate feature flag targeting, and displayed in the Flagsmith UI.
identifier.title: Identifier

key.description: Key used when selecting a value for a multivariate feature, or for % split segmentation. Set to an internal identifier or a composite value based on the environment key and identifier, depending on Flagsmith implementation.
key.title: Key

traits.description: A map of traits associated with the identity, where the key is the trait name and the value is the trait value.
traits.title: Traits

IdentityContext.title: IdentityContext

SegmentContext.description: Represents a segment context for feature flag evaluation.
SegmentContext.title: SegmentContext

SegmentCondition.description: Represents a condition within a segment rule for feature flag evaluation.

path.description: The path to the trait or value in the evaluation context.
path.title: Property

operator.description: The operator to use for evaluating the condition.
operator.title: Operator

value.description: The value to compare against the trait or context value.
value.title: Value

SegmentCondition.title: SegmentCondition

SegmentRule.description: Represents a rule within a segment for feature flag evaluation.

type.description: Segment rule type. Represents a logical quantifier for the conditions and sub-rules.
type.title: Type

conditions.description: Conditions that must be met for the rule to apply.
conditions.title: Conditions

sub_rules.description: Sub-rules nested within the segment rule.
sub_rules.title: Sub-rules

SegmentRule.title: SegmentRule

description: A context object containing the necessary information to evaluate Flagsmith feature flags.

identity.description: Identity context used for identity-based evaluation.

segments.description: Segments applicable to the evaluation context.
segments.title: Segments

features.description: Features to be evaluated in the context.
features.title: Features

title: EvaluationContext
